languages.text:
Сказано было Ульфара могучее слово.
Спета была погребальная гордая песнь,
Тело усталое брата, проклятого горем,
От панциря освободив, на костер возложил он.

So Ulfar's mighty word was spoken.
A proud funeral dirge was sung,
His brother's weary body,
cursed by grief,
from his carapace was freed
and laid upon the pyre.
languages.original_text:

languages.text:
ウルファーの力強い言葉は語られた。
誇り高き葬送の挽歌が歌われ
兄の疲弊した身体は
悲嘆に呪われ
外殻から解き放たれ
薪の上に安置された。
languages.original_text:
So Ulfar's mighty word was spoken.
A proud funeral dirge was sung,
His brother's weary body,
cursed by grief,
from his carapace was freed
and laid upon the pyre.

traits.locale_text:
ウルファーの力強い言葉は語られた。
誇り高き葬送の挽歌が歌われ
兄の疲弊した身体は
悲嘆に呪われ
外殻から解き放たれ
薪の上に安置された。

languages.text:
“乌尔法吐出强而有力的话语。
人们唱起悲壮的挽歌，
将兄弟疲惫的身体，
从盛满悲伤的躯壳中，
解放出来，
安放于火堆之上。”
languages.original_text:
So Ulfar's mighty word was spoken.
A proud funeral dirge was sung,
His brother's weary body,
cursed by grief,
from his carapace was freed
and laid upon the pyre.

traits.locale_text:
“乌尔法吐出强而有力的话语。
人们唱起悲壮的挽歌，
将兄弟疲惫的身体，
从盛满悲伤的躯壳中，
解放出来，
安放于火堆之上。”

languages.text:
« Ainsi parla hardiment Ulfar.
Un fier chant funèbre fut entonné
dans un chagrin infini,
tandis que le corps de son frère,
de sa carapace libéré,
fut ensuite sur le bûcher déposé. »
languages.original_text:
So Ulfar's mighty word was spoken.
A proud funeral dirge was sung,
His brother's weary body,
cursed by grief,
from his carapace was freed
and laid upon the pyre.

traits.locale_text:
« Ainsi parla hardiment Ulfar.
Un fier chant funèbre fut entonné
dans un chagrin infini,
tandis que le corps de son frère,
de sa carapace libéré,
fut ensuite sur le bûcher déposé. »

languages.text:
«Esas fueron las poderosas palabras de Ulfar.
Cantó un orgulloso réquiem
y el cuerpo agotado de su hermano,
lleno de pena,
de su prisión terrenal fue liberado
y colocado sobre la pira».
languages.original_text:
So Ulfar's mighty word was spoken.
A proud funeral dirge was sung,
His brother's weary body,
cursed by grief,
from his carapace was freed
and laid upon the pyre.

de su prisión terrenal fue liberado
y colocado sobre la pira».

languages.text:
So wurde Ulfars mächtiges Wort gesprochen.
Ein stolzes Totenlied wurde gesungen,
der müde Körper seines Bruders,
von der Trauer verflucht,
wurde aus seinem Panzer befreit
und auf den Scheiterhaufen gelegt.
languages.original_text:

A proud funeral dirge was sung,
His brother's weary body,
cursed by grief,
from his carapace was freed
and laid upon the pyre.

languages.text:
Ulfar'ın ulu sözleri duyuldu.
Azametli bir cenaze ağıdı yakıldı.
Kardeşinin kedere batmış
Bitkin cesedi,
Kabukzırhından kurtulup
Ateşlere uzandı.
languages.original_text:
So Ulfar's mighty word was spoken.
A proud funeral dirge was sung,
His brother's weary body,
cursed by grief,
from his carapace was freed
and laid upon the pyre.

traits.locale_text:
Ulfar'ın ulu sözleri söylendi.
Gururlu bir cenaze ağıdı yakıldı.
Kardeşinin kederle lanetlenmiş
bitkin bedeni,
kabukzırhından kurtuldu
ve ateşe uzandı.
